title.rendered: STEDI H8 | H9 | H11 | H16 LED Fog Light Bulbs (Pair)

content.rendered:
Plug & Play STEDI Night Pilot H11 LED Headlight Conversion Kit. Solid Heat-Sink compatible with H8, H9, H11 & H16 Fittings. Fog Light LED Globe Upgrade.

OVERVIEW

The LED Fog Light Globes are cross-compatible with connections H8, H9, H11 & H16 which you will find runs across the board in terms of the factory bumper fog lights. Unlike the STEDI Copper Head kits, these run a lower overall profile making it easier when installing.

PERFORMANCE

Producing the right level of light to reduce reflection from mist but still holding that brightness to cut through providing as much visibility to the road as possible.

HEAT DISSIPATION

LED Fog Light globes produce less heat in comparison to our STEDI Copper Heads hence the lack of tails & fans hanging off the end. Fitted up with an alloy heat sink is all you need to keep the LEDs in optimal operating temperatures.

DETAILS

STEDI H8 / H9 / H11 Night Pilots Fog Light Upgrade LED  Retrofit.

You’ve upgraded your headlights, parkers and high beam and now realized how yellow your fog lights are. The  STEDI H8 / H9 / H11 Night Pilots Fog Light Upgrade LED Retrofit is your answer.

H8 / H9 / H11 is a very common fog light bulb, if you’re not sure about compatibility please get in touch with our team.  H11, H9, and H8 are all the same bulbs as they share the same base.

TECHNOLOGY 

  • Electrically Protected again RFI and EM Interference
  • Over and Under Voltage Protection
  • Waterproof connectors
  • Plug and Play Connector
  • Ingress Protection IP65
  • True White 5700K to ensure perfect colour temp match with your other STEDI LED products
  • Solid heatsink with no fan ensure long operating life.

SPECIFICATIONS

HOUSING MATERIAL 6063 AVIATION ALUMINIUM
POWER 15W each
LUMENS 1500lm each
COMPATIBLE VOLTAGE DC 12v and 24v
LIFESPAN 30,000hours
CANBUS Sold Separately
CONNECTOR TYPE H8 / H9 / H11 / H16
INGRESS PROTECTION IP65
OPERATING TEMP -40c to + 80c

 

 

 

WHAT’S IN THE BOX

  • 2 x STEDI H8 / H9 / H11 Night Pilot LED Fog Light Globes
  • User Instruction Manual
  • 3M Double Sided Adhesive
  • Cable Ties

excerpt.rendered:
STEDI H8 | H9 | H11 | H16 LED Fog Light Bulbs (Pair)

Please note: If product is out of stock, wait times for this product can be between approx. 1 – 4 weeks from date of order.
